import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Cart() { const handleRemove=(bookId)=> { axios.delete(`http://localhost:9090//delete/${bookId}`) .then(res=> { loadWishlist() console.log(res) }) .catch(err=> { console.log(err) }) } return (
Back to Home cart My Orders

Wish List Items

{ wishlist.map(data=>(

{data.bookName}

Author: {data.bookAuthor}

Price: {data.bookPrice}

Buy
)) }
) } export default Cart
